content: **please consider adding the pattern to your favorites if you like it or plan on making it** **note if you are a tight knitter add an extra repeat or go up a needle size ** **tiilda hat** tiilda hat is a simple joyous project that just like tiilda mittens was born out of warm memories of cold sparkling white and beautiful winters in latvia it s a fast and rewarding knit with a simple pattern repeat and lots of texture and due to the bulky weight yarn can be finished in one evening *you can read more and download the free tiilda mittens pattern here ** tiilda mittens /patterns/library/tiilda-mittens *** the pattern includes written instructions and cable pattern chart **size** one size - to fit head circumference of 22 - 23 56cm - 58 5cm **yarn & yardage** deramores vintage chunky 50% merino wool 50% acrylic 153yards 140m per 100gr ball 1 ball in colour chalk or bulky chunky weight yarn approximately 147-153 yards 135m-140m *yardage includes 3 3/8 85mm pompom* **needles** us 6/ 4mm circulars with 16 40cm cable us 8/ 5mm circulars with 16 40cm cable **gauge** 15 stitches and 22 row to 4 10cm in larger size needles **notions** cable needle stitch marker tapestry needle 3 3/8 85mm size pompom maker happy knitting
